DOC.brief_summary: Slow release iron capsules have been designed based on the gastric delivery system. Iron absorption from those capsules administered with and without meals will be measured using stable iron isotopes.
DOC.criteria: female, age 1850 years, max. body weight 65 kg, serum ferritin < 35Âµg/l pregnancy, lactation, regular intake of medication, blood donation or significant blood losses over the past 4 months
